message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%, we can call it a day.
Meet me in the middle, 60-40 is a fair deal considering I'm losing value each round
I'm willing to budge a bit, but 65-35 is my final offer.  If you reject this, I'm sure you'll feel the effects of inflation even more in the next round.
I'd rather take a bigger share now, even with inflation, than settle for 35%. 55-45 is my counteroffer
